page.title: 04Fairfield village hall
page.content: At the village hall there are a lot of activities going on all day. There is bingo, a dog obedience class, keep fit class an old peoples' Welcome Club every Wednesday afternoon. Also there is a playschool. Every Christmas we have our party there and we have our easter disco there, also we do our pantomimes there. There is a Sunday School. Sometimes the church uses the village hall and after church they have tea and biscuits. Outside the village hall there is a war memorial and every ear they put a poppy wreath on it.
